summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6053 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 23, Comstock Supplemental Addition, as established by Ordinance No. 79603, being the alley between West Prospect Street and West Highland Drive from Sixth Avenue West to Willard Avenue; and certain other avenues and alleys, by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 82328, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
